TopicTitle: Different IVA suit for tourist Kerbals

Articles.Content: This would be a minor change, but it would be pretty cool to see the tourist Kerbals use the shirtsleeve and trousers that they wear in the astronaut complex / kerbal selection menu, except in flight. It would be an easy way to tell tourist Kerbals apart from normal astronauts.

I totally agree on this one.  It seems kind of odd to have them in the same suits as crew members.  Maybe some sort of lighter suit, considering a tourist wouldn't want to go through the hassle of getting a bulky suit on, and considering the fact that they don't go on EVA, pressurized cabins might be able to just have them wearing regular clothes.
You really are making a lot of tourism suggestion

TextureReplacer hasn't been updated to 1.1 yet, but about a year ago I made a skin pack for that mod that gave tourists an assortment of Hawaiian IVA suits to wear.

Spoiler
Tourists should have less military hair as well.
